properties.Name: Freiburg Galaxy Server
properties.Training: We offer twice a year a one week hands-on training course.

properties.Name: MPI-IE Galaxy Server
properties.Description: The Home of deepTools - test and play around with the latest deepTools version.

properties.Name: FMI Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Galaxy server at the Friedrich Miescher Institute for Biomedical Research - On top of the general Galaxy tools, we offer NGS and microarray analysis using custom made scripts for all wet lab researchers at the FMI.

properties.Name: GenOuest Galaxy Server
properties.Training: We offer several training course by year, mainly introductive ones.

properties.Name: BIPAA Galaxy Server
properties.Training: A server dedicated to insect genomic, maintained by BIPAA (http://bipaa.genouest.org) and hosted by GenOuest (http://genouest.org)

properties.Name: MDC Galaxy Server
properties.Training: We offer twice a year a hands-on training course.

properties.Name: Erasmus MC Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Galaxy server at Erasmus Medical Center in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. This server offers tools for NGS analysis, RNA-Seq and Metagenomics/Microbiomics

properties.Name: CPT Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Center for Phage Technology Server, offering tools for (Phage) NGS, Assembly, Analysis, and Annotation.

properties.Name: oqtans Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Customized version of the Galaxy framework provided by Rätsch Laboratory (ratschlab.org), extended with machine learning based tools for deep sequencing data analysis, eukaryotic gene finding, sequence analysis, and simple interface to Support Vector Machine toolbox.

properties.Name: Galaxy Server from the Galaxy Project
properties.Description: Main Galaxy Server from the Galaxy Project

properties.Name: Galaxy Melbourne
properties.Description: Galaxy server for Melbourne Bio research precinct.

properties.Name: Galaxy Queenland
properties.Description: Galaxy server for the Brisbane Bio research precinct.

properties.Name: SBI Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Galaxy server at the Dept. of Systems Biology and Bioinformatics in Rostock, Germany. This server offers tools for NGS analyses, esp. RNA-Seq data analysis - TRAPLINE - and structural variation detection of DNA-Seq data

properties.Name: MIT Fraenkel Lab/NeuroLINCS Galaxy
properties.Description: The purpose of this Galaxy Instance is to help operate and document the experiments of the NeuroLINCS Consortium.

properties.Name: Princeton University Genomics Galaxy Server
properties.Description: Galaxy server for Princeton University researchers

properties.Name: Earlham Galaxy
properties.Description: Galaxy server for researchers of the Earlham Institute and the other Norwich Bioscience Institutes

properties.Name: MI4U Galaxy Koala Server
properties.Description: Galaxy Koala server for researchers and clients of the MI4U startup, focused in protein prediction and molecular docking

properties.Name: Galaxy AP - Group
properties.Description: Galaxy server at the ETH Zurich Institute of Agricultural Sciences in the group of Animal Physiology - mostly NGS analysis tools.

properties.Name: Galaxy CEFAP-USP
properties.Description: Galaxy-CEFAP@USP is a server to perform NGS Data Analysis available to everyone in the scientific community.

properties.Name: Lifeportal
properties.Description: Bioinformatics portal with more than 400 tools for NGS and Phylogeny.

properties.Name: Hans-Rudolf Hotz
properties.Affiliation: Friedrich Miescher Institute for Biomedical Research
